1.0.1.name: wordpress/my-extreme-facebook
1.0.1.description:
My Extreme Facebook is a plugin that let you to use as a facebook fan page like box. It is easy to use for beginners. Just need to install and use a widget that automatically create by the plugin. All you need that is just paste your facebook fan page URL in the widget URL section. Please let me know if you found bug.
Thanks
Aaryan Ahmed AL Amin
